titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the week of September 23, 2024, as "National Latino Gastronomic Cuisine Week", and celebrating the vibrant and diverse culinary traditions of Latino gastronomy.

Expressing support for the designation of the week of September 23, 2024, as "National Latino Gastronomic Cuisine Week", and celebrating the vibrant and diverse culinary traditions of Latino gastronomy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary:
This resolution supports the designation of National Latino Gastronomic Cuisine Week.
The resolution also encourages federal agencies, local governments, and community organizations to collaborate in supporting initiatives that promote Latino gastronomy.
